definitions.definition: The time of day when the Sun seems to reach its highest point in the sky; solar noon .
examples: On Saturdays, I love to have a lie-in until noon .
The race is due to start at noon sharp.

subdefinitions.definition: The mean time of solar noon , marked as twelve o'clock on most clocks.

definitions.definition: ( now rare ) The corresponding time in the middle of the night; midnight .
( obsolete ) The ninth hour of the day counted from sunrise ; around three o'clock in the afternoon.

main_definition: The time of day when the Sun seems to reach its highest point in the sky; solar noon .
secondary_definitions: ( now rare ) The corresponding time in the middle of the night; midnight .
( obsolete ) The ninth hour of the day counted from sunrise ; around three o'clock in the afternoon.

definitions.definition: The letter ن in the Arabic script .

main_definition: The letter ن in the Arabic script .
